name: Coulson Aviation
about: Coulson Aviation, a family-owned company based in Port Alberni, British Columbia, Canada, is a leader in aerial firefighting and aviation training. With over 36 years of experience and 160,000 safe flight hours, Coulson operates a diverse fleet of fixed-wing and rotary-wing aircraft. The company has established the Coulson Aviation Academy, certified by Transport Canada, offering a 10-month program for aircraft structures technicians, providing hands-on experience and guaranteed employment upon graduation. Known for its innovative firefighting techniques, including night aerial fire suppression and proprietary RADS-XXL technology, Coulson trains pilots and technicians with advanced simulators and real-world training. The company is committed to safety, innovation, and community involvement, ensuring the next generation of aviation professionals is well-equipped to combat wildfires globally.
